meanings.definition: Chickpeas: a round yellowish seed used widely as food.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating chickpeas in my salad.
meanings.sent2: Many people like to snack on roasted chickpeas.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chickpeas go to the party? To have a good time!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a chickpea in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked chickpeas filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Chickpeas: the plant that produces chickpeas.
meanings.sent1: Farmers grow chickpeas in their fields.
meanings.sent2: The chickpea plant needs plenty of sunlight to thrive.
meanings.sent3: The chickpeas whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The chickpea plant stood tall like a guardian in the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent5: The chickpeas swayed gently in the breeze, soaking up the sunshine.
